muclient.script:
sub GotPacket (which) ColourTell "white", "green", which end sub
sub OnPluginInstall () status = UdpListen ("0.0.0.0", 4222, "GotPacket") status = UdpListen ("0.0.0.0", 4223, "GotPacket") if status <> 0 then ColourNote "white", "red", _ "UdpListen not installed, error code " & status else ColourNote "white", "darkgreen", "UdpListen installed" end if end sub
